definitions.text: something that is a source of danger
examples: earthquakes are a constant threat in Japan

definitions.text: a warning that something unpleasant is imminent
examples: they were under threat of arrest

definitions.text: declaration of an intention or a determination to inflict harm on another
examples: his threat to kill me was quite explicit

definitions.text: a person who inspires fear or dread
examples: he was the terror of the neighborhood
